2155 toward an understand of data structur thi paper present a notat and formal for describ the semant of data structur thi is base on direct graph with name edg and transform on these graph in addit an implement facil is describ which could be part of a program languag which allow a programm who ha express the semant of an algorithm in term of the graph to then specifi the implement of some of hi data structur in order to gain effici cacm octob 1971 earlei j data structur graph implement semant formal program languag 4 22 4 9 5 24 ca711001 jb februari 2 1978 1 35 pm 1024 4 2155 1051 4 2155 1051 4 2155 1102 4 2155 1132 4 2155 1390 4 2155 1486 4 2155 1549 4 2155 1552 4 2155 1665 4 2155 1706 4 2155 1826 4 2155 1860 4 2155 1860 4 2155 1878 4 2155 1957 4 2155 378 4 2155 2060 4 2155 2155 4 2155 2155 4 2155 2155 4 2155 2155 4 2155 2155 4 2155 2162 4 2155 2168 4 2155 2294 4 2155 2406 4 2155 2558 4 2155 2710 4 2155 2715 4 2155 2716 4 2155 2717 4 2155 2718 4 2155 2719 4 2155 2723 4 2155 2765 4 2155 2817 4 2155 2838 4 2155 2842 4 2155 2842 4 2155 2855 4 2155 2879 4 2155 2888 4 2155 2901 4 2155 2957 4 2155 2959 4 2155 2965 4 2155 3077 4 2155 3077 4 2155 3080 4 2155 3087 4 2155 3106 4 2155 3150 4 2155 3154 4 2155 627 4 2155 106 4 2155 210 5 2155 1389 5 2155 378 5 2155 2046 5 2155 2060 5 2155 2155 5 2155 2155 5 2155 2155 5 2155 2252 5 2155 2594 5 2155 1358 6 2155 1496 6 2155 1771 6 2155 2155 6 2155 2155 6 2155 2204 6 2155 3184 6 2155 3186 6 2155
